  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_93065</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_93065</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Thermal energy utilisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thermische Energieanwendung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation thermique d'énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Utilização térmica da energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Utilizzazione termica di energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θερμική ενεργειακή χρησιμοποίηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Utilización termal de la energía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three different ways that we can utilise thermal energy: to provide light, to cook food, and to turn turbines.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Cooking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turbine</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei unterschiedlichen 
Möglichkeiten, daß wir thermische Energie verwenden können: 
Licht, zur Kochnahrung und zu den Umdrehung Turbinen zur 
Verfügung stellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve à trois voies 
différentes que nous pouvons utiliser l'énergie thermique : 
pour fournir la lumière, à la nourriture de cuisinier, et aux 
turbines de tour.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a três maneiras 
diferentes que nós podemos utilizar a energia térmica: para 
fornecer a luz, ao alimento do cozinheiro, e às turbinas da volta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica a tre modi differenti
che possiamo utilizzare l'energia termica: per fornire luce, 
all'alimento del cuoco ed alle turbine di girata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τρεις διαφορετικούς 
τρόπους ότι μπορούμε να χρησιμοποιήσουμε τη θερμική ενέργεια: 
για να παρέχει το φως, για να μαγειρεψει τα τρόφιμα, και για 
να γυρίσουν τους στροβίλους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a tres diversas maneras
que podemos utilizar energía termal: para proporcionar a la 
luz, al alimento del cocinero, y a las turbinas de la vuelta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kochen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">thermische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Turbine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cuisine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie cinétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie légère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">turbine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cozinhar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia cinética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia clara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">turbina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia cinetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia chiara</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia termica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">turbina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγείρεμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κινητική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελαφριά ενέργεια</string>
